events.name: Solace Workshop
events.subtitle: ğŸ”— Connecting the Dots: Event-Driven Architecture!
events.description: This workshop covers the fundamentals of Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) with a focus on how Solace implements it. Learn why and how Software Developers and Architects use this pattern. We'll also guide students through connecting their applications to a Solace Event Broker for 'Pub/Sub' (publish/subscribe) functionality. This session serves as a quick bootstrap for participants to get set up and ready to qualify for our challenge.

events.name: MLH Workshop
events.subtitle: Figma to Code: Learning Design with Dev Mode
events.description: Figma Dev Mode is a new Figma feature designed to create smoother collaboration between designers and developers, as well as empower hackers to level up their own design-skills. The tool provides hackers with a detailed view of design files, including access to specs, assets, and code snippets, ensuring accuracy in the design implementation while saving time in the process. Whether youâ€™re completely new to designing websites or want to expand your existing skill set, this workshop is a great way to learn one of the most developer friendly and professionally utilized design tools on the market.
